abstract: Federal investigator says Kansas City business owner Thu Hong Nguyen intentionally set fire to her property and faces arson charge and two counts of second-degree murder for resulting deaths of firefighters Larry Leggio and John Mesh.
lead_paragraph: A woman who owned one of the businesses destroyed in a fire that killed two Kansas City, Mo., firefighters this month was charged Tuesday with intentionally starting the blaze.

headline.main: Missouri: Spa Owner Charged in Arson That Killed 2 Kansas City Firefighters
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Spa Owner Charged in Arson That Killed 2 Kansas City Firefighters

snippet: A woman who owned one of the businesses destroyed in a fire that killed two Kansas City, Mo., firefighters this month was charged Tuesday with intentionally starting the blaze.
